title: perside camera nonfunctional...
body:
wrote a ticket to riot.  they told me to post here about it.  just adding my two cents cuz i did a search thingy and tons of the same problems are reported by other users.  yea yea yea theres alot of posts about this problem alrdy.  just doing what a rioter told me to do and post.  

can i play regularly?  sure.  do i like to?  not really.  camera lock is my crutch and i like it.  but i do unlock it for ult skillshots when the need arises.

please and thank you riot.  i got that it wont be fixed soon but i do appreciate your hard work and dedication to your fanbase.  i hope it wont hurt to ask if you guys could speed up the repair process? :D

replies.body:
Hiya Eighth Sin! 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue, and you should see a fix in 6.3. ^-^
Why did the support team tell him to come here if you where just going to fix it anyways?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I'm not sure if they keep track of all issues, but it's good practice for everyone to report on the boards so we have a central location for issues.
Is there an option to center the camera in semi-locked mode? Spacebar doesn't do anything

i dunno... maybe to see how many ppl report to gauge how serious it is or something.  im just doing as im told via riot ppl.  if it fixes the problem im having ill do it.  sounds a little drone mentality but it gets the job done.
YAY!!! thank you!!!  any ETA on when 6.3 is coming?
Tommorow is patch 6.3 i think, not long to go.
